mapper.select: select a.prod_id,a.type_id,b.type_name,a.prod_name,a.prod_num,a.update_time,a.prod_state from t_prod_main a inner join t_prod_type b on a.type_id=b.type_id where 1=1 order by a.update_time desc
select a.prod_id,a.type_id,b.type_name,a.prod_name,a.prod_num,a.update_time,a.prod_state from t_prod_main a where a.prod_id=#{prodId}
